name: Rocket Run (benjames171)
description:
Thrust and rotate your way around 6 alien environments looking for artefacts and avoiding incoming fire from sentries lurking in dark corners.

Floating mines loiter in the dark caverns, waiting to blow you up. Find refueling barrels and shield recharging pick-ups to aid your progress.

When you have all 4 artefacts on the level, make your way to the landing pad at the top of the level.

Controls
W - thrust
A - rotate left
D - rotate right
ESC - quit game

Contact
